topKills.flavorText: "I just like the name. Doesn't mean anything." —Lord Felwinter to Lord Timur
"My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there before we got to the City." —Amanda Holliday
"Yours, until the last flame dies and all words have been spoken." —Shin Malphur to you, as you journey forth into the unknown
According to official Vanguard policy, this weapon does not exist.
"To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objects—hollow of spirit and meaning." —13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow
An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Spider's eclectic tastes.
"If you think this world ends well, you are mistaken." —Arach Jalaal
topKills.displaySource: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

topKills.flavorText: "No. I will not allow a Fallen to fight in the Banner, that right is reserved for Guardians alone. But if you insist, I may allow a Guardian to carry a Fallen-forged weapon into battle. You are a weaponsmith, are you not?" —Lord Saladin to an Unknown Eliksni
topKills.displaySource: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

topEfficiency.flavorText: A single word etched onto the inside of the weapon's casing: Now.
Friends are as companions on a journey who ought to aid each other to persevere.
